titles.title: Waiving certain points of order against the bill (H.R. 3116) making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1994, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-263, by Mr. Frost.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3116. The resolution waives certain points of order against the bill when called up for consideration. Measure will be read by paragraph. Bill is open to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 93.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 254 - 176 (Roll no. 475).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/28/1993--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 3116 (armed forces appropriations).
